column.name: expression
column.value: "PULL".equals(messageType) && purposeCode != null && (purposeCode.value == "1" || purposeCode.value == "5" || purposeCode.value == "3") && referencedID != null && referencedID.schemeId == "UUID" && !mdrService.validateFormat(referencedID, creationDateOfMessage) && !containsAny(nonUniqueIdsList, Arrays.asList(referencedID)) && !containsAny(otherReportIdsInTheGroup, Arrays.asList(referencedID))

column.name: expression
column.value: "PULL".equals(messageType) && (referencedID != null || (purposeCode != null && (purposeCode.value == "1" || purposeCode.value == "5" || purposeCode.value == "3"))) && referencedID != null && referencedID.schemeId == "UUID" && !mdrService.validateFormat(referencedID, creationDateOfMessage) && !containsAny(nonUniqueIdsList, Arrays.asList(referencedID))
